Title: Spectro-Thermometry of M dwarfs and their candidate planets: too hot, too cool, or just right?
Authors: Mann, A. W.; Gaidos, E.; Ansdell, M.
Table: Kepler Planet Parameters
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: Stellar_params.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units      Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  7  F7.3  ---        KOI       Kepler Object of Interest Number
   9- 16  F8    ---        KID       Kepler ID
  18- 23  F6.3  Earth      Rp        Planet Radius
  25- 30  F6.3  Earth      E_Rp      Planet radius error
  32- 38  F7.2  Earth      S         Planet irradiance
  40- 44  F6.2  Earth      E_S       Plaet irradiance error
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note (1):
KOI 2704 has a Teff below our coolest calibration star. Therefore only upper limits are given.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
